pullrequest.title: Add gpu rays class for lidar simulation

content.raw: Not exactly, I'm also looking into it. I think the first pass material maynot be setup properly. I tried printing out `_material->isLoaded` and it's returning `0`. Debugging into ogre also shows that when the render target’s update is called, no render pass is actually being run.
content.html: Not exactly, I'm also looking into it. I think the first pass material maynot be setup properly. I tried printing out _material->isLoaded and it's returning 0. Debugging into ogre also shows that when the render target’s update is called, no render pass is actually being run.
